column2: A method that uses more methods or variables from another (unrelated) class than from its own class violates the principle of putting data and behavior in the same place.
column4: Method Main is too closely tied to [["Console"|"file:///usr/share/dotnet/packs/Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref/3.1.0/ref/netcoreapp3.1/System.Console.dll:0:0:0:0"]]: 4 dependencies to it, but only 0 dependencies to its own type.
